alert.note: Alert for Hitchcock; Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 19 at 9:59AM CST until January 20 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM MST /MIDNIGHT CST/ THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST /NOON CST/ SATURDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of northwest and west central Kansas and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...From 11 PM MST /midnight CST/ this evening to 11 AM MST /noon CST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Increased potential for frostbite and hypothermia. Frostbite may occur on exposed skin in less than 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The coldest wind chill readings are expected to occur around sunrise Saturday.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
